name: B1OAI
description: B1O (Bio-Inspired AI One) is an AI-powered Web3 health and wellness platform that combines personalized nutrition, digital well-being, and blockchain incentives. By leveraging bio-inspired AI algorithms, B1O analyzes user health data—such as activity levels, stress, and sleep patterns—to provide customized lifestyle recommendations. The ecosystem rewards users with B1OAI tokens for their data and engagement, creating a data-to-earn model that bridges AI-driven healthcare with decentralized finance.
